name: Half Color Hair
description:
This LoRA was created to produce images of women with 2 different hair colors. It works better with some colors than others, and works best with higher weights and hires fix.

It should work well with any model based off of Stable Diffusion 1.5. Please leave a review and let me see what you make with it!

.

Grab the latest versions of everything on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/mooncryptowow where I share all of my prompts and settings, uncensored art, custom models and files, as well as general knowledge and tutorials.

Check me out on IG at: https://www.instagram.com/mooncryptowow/

Facebook at: https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100087374733528

modelVersions.name: v1.0
trainedWords: (hlfcol haired girl with color1 and color2 hair)
